General.Name: DRTECH Corporation
General.Description: DRTECH Corporation engages in the development, manufacture, and sale of flat-panel X-ray detectors for digital radiography in South Korea and internationally. Its products include Exprimer, an indirect detector; FLAATZ, a direct type flat-type panel detector; and RoseM, a digital mammography solution; and Expeed. DRTECH Corporation was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
General.Address: SPG Dream building, Seongnam-si, South Korea, 13558
